extension.summary: Automatically download artwork for your media.
extension.description: Artwork Dump automatically downloads artwork for media in your video and music libraries into your media file system. It only downloads artwork already added to your libraries.
extension.news: v0.3.0 (2024-01-27) - feature: add option to disable tracking processed items in a database - feature: pre-cache special images, like video thumbnails - fix: download artwork for BDMV and VIDEO_TS to correct folder - improve: slightly faster image pre-caching that doesn't require HTTP - improve: better strategy to pick multiple fanart from scraper
